## Machine Learning


* [An Introduction to Statistical Learning with Applications in Python](https://stevenkhwun.github.io/Test/Books/Machine_Learning/ISLP_website-compressed.pdf), PDF version, by _Gareth James, Daniela Witten, Trevor Hastie, Robert Tibshirani and Jonathan Taylor_. Printed on 5 July 2023.

  
## Mathematics

* [Solving Mathematical Problems: A Personal Perspective](https://stevenkhwun.github.io/Test/Books/Mathematics/solving-mathematical-problems-terence-tao.pdf), PDF version, by _Terence Tao_. (2nd Edition, 2006)

## Python

* [Python for Data Analysis: Data Wrangling with pandas, NumPy, and Jupyter](https://wesmckinney.com/book/), Web version, by _Wes McKinney_. (3rd Edition, September 2022)

* [Python for Excel: A Modern Environment for Automation and Data Analysis](https://stevenkhwun.github.io/Test/Books/Python/Python-for-Excel.pdf), PDF version, by _Felix Zumstein_. (1st Edition, March 2021)
  
  The GitHub site of the book can be found [here](https://github.com/fzumstein/python-for-excel).
